channel.title: Endgame :: SANS Holiday Hack Challenge 2025
channel.description: Upon completion of the final objective, the game transitions to the endgame sequence at the Grand Hotel, where the full Counter Hack team is presented: Interacting with Santa provides a consolidated narrative explanation of the events leading up to the incident and its resolution. Santa’s dialogue frames the outcome as the successful prevention of a sustained environmental manipulation attack against the Dosis Neighborhood. It also contextualizes Frosty’s actions as being driven by a persistent existential threat—seasonal melting—and highlights an unexploited alternative resolution that did not involve infrastructure sabotage or coercion through third parties (the Gnomes):
